channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 21:44 Air alarm to the Kiev region follow further messages.
item.description: 游댮 21:44 Air alarm to the Kiev region follow further messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 21:01 The threat of artobrats to Pokrovskaya territorial community. Consider, anxiety is still in:- Nikopol district
item.description: 游리 21:01 The threat of artobrats to Pokrovskaya territorial community. Consider, anxiety is still in:- Nikopol district#Pokrovskaya_ territorial_ community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
